page.title: 15Industry,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: In Green Street Green there is one factory called Telcon Plastic.It is on the site of the old brewery which first brought people to the area.The factory employs 135 people.It is involved in the Youth Training Scheme,helping youngsters to form a career.The factory makes approximately 140 different items,and some of these are exported. Eureka Engineering is a small company on Rushmore Hill.They bring in parts of cookers,put them together,and do the engineering on them.They have about 17 people working for them. The pottery in Pratts Bottom sells house plaques,sculptures,lamp-shade bases and paintings of birds,flowers and animals. Waitrose,the main food shop,employs 135 staff.Other employers are the local shops and garages.
